body: @ArgusVulcrad Says the guy with cockroach porn on his favorites. Hentai is about tolerance. If people are into this kind of shit, let them be. Just don't look. Works for me.
Its a huge turn off for me too but man u have to tolarate shit (hihi) like this. You probably like stuff that other people think is gross as long as its not your shit you shouldnt give a shit...shit

Anyone who actually gets turned on by scat is a sick, disgusting piece of shit (pun intended). They should be melted into a vat of acid and have their bubbly, liquefied remains flushed down the toilet.
